sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container>
      <v-card>
        <v-card-title>{{ person.name }}</v-card-title>
        <v-card-subtitle>{{ person.cpf }}</v-card-subtitle>
        <v-card-text>
          <v-list>
            <v-list-item>
              <v-list-item-content>
                <v-list-item-title>Email</v-list-item-title>
                <v-list-item-subtitle>{{ person.email }}</v-list-item-subtitle>
              </v-list-item-content>
            </v-list-item>
            <v-list-item>
              <v-list-item-content>
                <v-list-item-title>Telefone</v-list-item-title>
                <v-list-item-subtitle>{{ person.phone }}</v-list-item-subtitle>
              </v-list-item-content>
            </v-list-item>
            <v-list-item v-for="address in person.addresses" :key="address.id">
              <v-list-item-content>
                <v-list-item-title>{{ address.type | capitalize }}</v-list-item-title>
                <v-list-item-subtitle>{{ formatAddress(address) }}</v-list-item-subtitle>
              </v-list-item-content>
            </v-list-item>
          </v-list>
        </v-card-text>
      </v-card>
    </v-container>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  import axios from 'axios';
  
  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        person: null,
      };
    },
    methods: {
      fetchPersonDetails() {
        axios.get(`/registrations/${this.$route.params.id}`)
          .then(response => {
            this.person = response.data.data;
          })
          .catch(error => {
            console.error('Erro ao buscar detalhes da pessoa:', error);
          });
      },
      formatAddress(address) {
        return `${address.street}, ${address.number}${address.complement ? ', ' + address.complement : ''} - ${address.neighborhood}, ${address.city} - ${address.state}`;
      }
    },
    filters: {
      capitalize(value) {
        if (!value) return '';
        value = value.toString();
        return value.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + value.slice(1);
      }
    },
    mounted() {
      this.fetchPersonDetails();
    }
  }
  </script>
  
  <style>
  /* Estilos adicionais, se necess√°rio */
  </style>
